name: Cantarito De Amatitán

ingredients.item: Azuñia blanco or reposado organic tequila

preparation:
Combine the first six ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker and shake vigorously for 10 seconds.
Add the dash of sea salt to the bottom of a chilled pint glass and pour contents of shaker into glass.
Top off with grapefruit soda and garnish with an orange slice.
